about_the_game:
Shadows have invaded the remains of an ancient kingdom and now threaten to overrun the vast world of Prismeria. In this clicker RPG, play as Anna, a young warrior determined to make her way among these dark beings and put their leaders in their place, including the one who escaped from his prison and who is nicknamed the Shadow of the Pantheon... Evolve in a universe rich in stories and drawn by hand.

Map exploration

Once glorious, the Pantheon was a kingdom made to fight the gods and their followers. Separated into four districts: War, Magic, Arts and the Royal district; each has a tyrannical ruler to defeat in their castle.

Freely explore the map marked by encounters blocking your path to each ruler's castle.

Search every corners to find chests and secrets hidden across the map, off the path, to help you reach the castles.

Real-time battle

The formidable enemies are numerous and varied, made up of fearless soldiers, powerful mages and deceitful artists seeking to hinder your progress. Will you manage to defeat them?

Face waves of enemies trying to reach your character to eliminate them in dynamic battles.

Encounter mechanically and visually diverse enemies. The soldiers will come into contact with you to use their blades while the mages will be at a distance, using their spells to harass you. It's up to you to adapt your battle strategy against the various profiles encountered in the game.

Knock down powerful bosses with unique mechanics that require you to redouble your efforts to defeat them.

A simple gameplay to inflict damage on enemies: just click on them or use one of the hero's four spells spread over four keys.

Choose your way to fight:

  • Click: to click quickly and swiftly remove enemies from the screen.

  • Click and hold: To deal constant damage without tiring or losing effectiveness.

  • Spells: spells to boost you, slow down enemies, deal damage, etc. These are jokers to turn the tide of combat, which changes depending on the character played.

Varied and unique characters

The Pantheon is home to many heroes lurking in the shadows, just waiting for your light to reveal their potential. Help Anna rally as many people as possible to her cause.

A rich catalog of unique characters to play with their own statistics and exclusive spell panel allowing you to approach combat differently.

Some enemies are potential valuable allies for Anna's cause. Will you find a way to rally them to your expedition?

Equipment and Statistics

The adventure would be more dangerous without equipment, fortunately the Pantheon is full of treasures to overcome this problem!

Powerful items to equip in order to increase your stats to be more effective against increasingly tough enemies.

Three simple statistics which are Health Points, increasing endurance in combat, Attack, improving the damage of your clicks and Magic, making your spells more effective.

Make equipment combinations to have the playstyle you want and adapt to the challenges encountered.
